title: 86/74/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 February 1986 approving the special programme for the autonomous Province of Trento concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 February 1986
approving the special programme for the autonomous Province of Trento concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(86/74/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The specific programme forwarded by the Italian Government on 7 March 1985 for the autonomous Province of Trento concerning the development of production of beef and veal, sheepmeat and goatmeat, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1944/81 is hereby approved as well as the adaptation of the said programme forwarded on 4 November 1985.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 February 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 197, 20. 7. 1981, p. 27.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
